name: @fabiocaccamo/layers.css
description: Pure (s)css html layers, no js at all.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npx sass src/scss/layers.scss dist/css/layers.css --style=expanded --no-source-map && npx sass src/scss/layers.scss dist/css/layers.min.css --style=compressed --no-source-map
scripts.reinstall: rm package-lock.json && rm -rf node_modules && npm install
